channel.title: Connect to Google Analytics(GA4)
channel.description: I want to use redash to request my GA4 data. But I found that it only support Analytics API. for the reason that we can access GA4 data with Google Analytics Data API v1. I want to now how can we use redash to access GA4?

item.title: Connect to Google Analytics(GA4)
item.dc:creator: wenjuan
item.description:
when will it be merged in main branch?
We can not use UA on 1 July 2023 any more.

Read full topic

item.title: Connect to Google Analytics(GA4)
item.dc:creator: vinodpandey
item.description:
pull request contains query runner for Google Analytics Data API (GA4) and Google Search Console API. You can use the code from the pull request or wait for this to get merged in main branch.

Read full topic

item.title: Connect to Google Analytics(GA4)
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Did you search the forum before posting? From a few weeks ago:

Google Analytics Reporting API v4 Feature Requests
Welcome to the forum! You’re correct the current GA query runner only supports v3. Redash is a community project that relies on contributions from others to support new data sources. For anyone wishing to implement a google analytics V4 query runner, you can follow our new doc (published a few weeks ago) on how to write a new quer runner: https://redash.io/help/open-source/dev-guide/write-a-query-runner It’s pretty easy to do. And we’re happy to answer questions here on the forum if you hit an…

Read full topic

item.description:
I want to use redash to request my GA4 data. But I found that it only support Analytics API.
for the reason that we can access GA4 data with Google Analytics Data API v1. I want to now how can we use redash to access GA4?
